translation.en: Number one, step forward and face the mirror.
Number two.
Number three.
Four.
Have another look at this one, ma'am…
if you get my meaning.
We're talking about violent killings. Murder, ma'am.

translation.en: Is this not the woman you saw?
Zenzile Mwale.
Zenzi. Do you… Do you mind if I call you Zenzi?
You've had quite a week, huh?
A trail of bodies all over the damn city.
Dead criminals falling from the sky.
translation.ja: 犯罪者どもが死んでる

translation.en: Right. Start talking.
Why did you murder these men?
Eyewitnesses, CCTV cameras, they put you on the scene. You're caught red- handed.

translation.en: What the hell are you mixed up in?
Who are you?
I am just a cleaner.
Hey, you.
So, how's the little guy doing?
- Who said it was a guy? - I can feel it. I'm sure it's a guy.
translation.ja: 坊や？ 俺には分かる　男の子だ

translation.en: Damn it.
Ah. Morning, Zenzi.
Running late, hmm?
Morning, Mr. Booysen.
What have I told you? Call me Enrico. I'm your landlord, but I'm also a friend.
translation.ja: “エンリコ”と呼んでくれ 地主だが友人でもある

translation.en: Yes.
Thank you, Mr. Booysen.
Zenzi!
You're three weeks late again. Enough is enough.
translation.ja: 家賃を３週間 滞納してる もう待てない

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mr. Booysen.
I've taken on extra shifts. I'll make up the rent. Please.
translation.ja: シフトを増やしたので 近いうちに払います

translation.en: I just need more time.
Hey.
You know I'm here to help, na?
If we need to put our heads together and, uh, make a plan.
translation.ja: ２人で知恵を出し合い 計画を立てよう

translation.en: I just don't want to see you out on the street.
translation.ja: 路頭に迷う君を見たくない

translation.en: Not after…
You know? And without a man to protect you.
translation.ja: 君には 守ってくれる男がいない

translation.en: Well… today's the day.
translation.ja: でも それも今日までです

translation.en: - Today? - Hmm.
Max is coming home.
- Good. Maybe now I'll see my money. -
Enrico! Where are you?
Your breakfast.
Summer! Mummy's home.
translation.ja: サマー　帰ったわよ

translation.en: Hi, Zenzi.
Ma'am, did you remember that today--
You didn't forget to collect Summer, did you, Zenzi?
translation.ja: サマーのお迎えを 忘れたわね？

translation.en: Summer?  No.
translation.ja: サマー？ 会ったこともありません

translation.en: I've never even met her.
translation.ja: 会ったこともありません

translation.en: Missed me!
My sneaky little girl.
Oh! I did. I did. I did. Oh.
Mama?
It's for Papa when you take me to visit him. You promised.
I know, baby. I know.
Uh, ma'am.
I need to leave a bit early today.
It's today? That he gets out?
H- how long has it been?
Two years now.
Are you sure about this? Come on, he put you through so much.
translation.ja: 本当にいいの？ 彼のせいであなたは苦しんだ

translation.en: He's changed, ma'am.
Toxic men never change.
translation.ja: 有害な男は変わらない

translation.en: Sometimes it's best to leave our past behind us.
translation.ja: 過去を捨てたほうが いい場合もある

translation.en: Okay?
Hello, sir. I'm here to fetch my husband, Maxwell Mwale.
translation.ja: マックスウェル･ムワレを 迎えに来ました

translation.en: Uh, wait over there.
Oh, okay.
Hello.
I missed you.
- - Okay, okay, I'm coming.
Max Mwale, you're under arrest for the murder of Yazid Noordien.
translation.ja: ヤジド･ノルディンの 殺害容疑で逮捕する

translation.en: What?
- What's going on? - I love you.
No, wait.
- Move it! - This is a mistake. Wait.
translation.ja: 歩け 何かの誤解よ

translation.en: - Max, what is this? -
Who are you waiting for, sister?
Um, my husband, Maxwell Mwale.
translation.ja: 夫のマックスウェル･ ムワレです

translation.en: He was supposed to be released today at 5:00. I got here just after 5:00.
translation.ja: 今日の５時に 釈放される予定でした

translation.en: It says here he was released this morning.
translation.ja: 彼なら今朝 釈放されてる

translation.en: He's gone, sister.
He's gone?
No.
I don't know what to tell you. Your husband's a free man.
translation.ja: 言葉がないが ご主人は自由の身だ

translation.en: Congratulations. But he's not here.
translation.ja: おめでとう　ここにはいない

translation.en: Max?
Max?
Zenzi, do you know what time it is?
Alice, have you seen Max?
translation.ja: アリス　夫を見てない？

translation.en: - Is this a joke? - No. No. He got out today.
translation.ja: 何？ 今日 出所したのに 帰ってない

translation.en: But he's not home.
translation.ja: 今日 出所したのに 帰ってない

translation.en: Well, if I saw him, I would chase him away unless he brings the rent.
translation.ja: もし見かけたら まず家賃を払わせる

translation.en: Anyway, you're better off without him. Count yourself lucky.
translation.ja: 彼とは別れたほうがいい

translation.en: Zenzi…
Did Enrico tell you? We're selling the house.
translation.ja: 夫に聞いた？ 家は売りに出す

translation.en: We don't have a choice anymore.
You're gonna have to find somewhere else to live for free.
translation.ja: タダで住める家を探すのね

translation.en: You've got till the end of the month to pack up your things.
translation.ja: 月末までに荷物をまとめて

translation.en: I'd like to report a missing person, please.
Missing person?
Yes, my husband.
Name?
Zenzile Mwale.
His name.
Oh. Maxwell. Maxwell Mwale.
translation.ja: マックスウェル･ムワレです

translation.en: Ay. It's these Zimbabweans again.
The husband is off with his mistress, and the wife comes to us to find him.
translation.ja: 〈愛人と去った夫を 妻が捜しに来る〉

translation.en: - Cry me a river. -
I can hear you.
I am not Zimbabwean. I'm from Bethlehem in the Free State.
translation.ja: 私は自由州の ベスレヘム出身よ

translation.en: And my husband is not with some mistress.
He got out of jail today. He was supposed to come home, but he didn't.

translation.en: So are you going to help me or not?
Look, these men are trouble, sister.
He's probably out drinking with friends, having a good time.
translation.ja: 友達と飲みに行ってるのさ

translation.en: Maybe you're better off.
Hi, this is Naledi.
translation.ja: ナレディです 留守電は残さずメールして

translation.en: Don't leave a voicemail. Just text me. Thanks, bye.
translation.ja: ナレディです 留守電は残さずメールして じゃあね

translation.en: Hi. I'm looking for this guy,
translation.ja: どうも この人を捜してるの マックスよ

translation.en: Max.
translation.ja: この人を捜してるの マックスよ

translation.en: - Have you seen him? - Huh- uh.
Hello.
I'm looking for this guy. Have you seen him? Max.
translation.ja: この人を捜してるの 見てない？

translation.en: Hey. I know you.
Max's piece of ass.
Wait. You know Max?
Max is in jail, sister.
- No, no, he got out. - Well, he's not here.
translation.ja: 出所した だが ここにはいない

translation.en: You need a new man to warm your bed, eh?

translation.en: No.
No. Leave me. Leave me.
Fuck off, you drunk shit.
Well, if Max isn't in jail, he's dead.
translation.ja: 出所したなら今頃 死んでる

translation.en: So fuck him. And fuck you!
translation.ja: ヤツもあんたもくたばれ

translation.en: What are you playing, coming here?
I was just trying to find my husband.
He wasn't at the prison, and he didn't come home. I don't know where to look anymore.

translation.en: No one will help me.
I will help you.
Thank you, Mr. Booysen.
Enrico.
I… I really need to get home.
I will walk you home. Safe.

translation.en: Fuck.
Okay. Thank you, Mr. Booysen.
Anything you need…
I'm here.
Okay. Good night, Mr. Booysen.
translation.ja: では おやすみなさい

translation.en: I should fix that door for you.
Oh, no, it's okay. I'm already used to it.
And the rent?
Make a plan.
Zenzi.
- Zenzi, open the door. -
Bitch.
Zenzi, I'm just trying to help you.

translation.en: Zenzi.
Zenzi. Zenzi.
Enrico! Leave that bloody maid, before I put you both on the street!
translation.ja: 〈エンリコ　やめなさい 通りに放り出すよ〉

translation.en: Fucking cock teaser.
No wonder he's not coming back. Anything to get away from you.
translation.ja: どうりで夫も 帰ってこないわけだ

translation.en: How do you plead?
Guilty.
I killed Yazid Noordien.
You do realize that if you are lying, not only are you in contempt of court,
translation.ja: ウソをつけば法廷侮辱罪に 問われるだけでなく―

translation.en: but you're leaving the real criminals on the street?
I do.
I killed him.
Max?
Hello?
Who is this?
Max, is that you?
After everything I've done,
why are you still here?
I am your wife, Max.
Esulu is your son.
I know who you really are.
translation.ja: 私はあなたを知ってる

translation.en: Then maybe this is my chance to change.
For the better.
Whatever it takes.
Why, Max?
What is it you're not telling me?
What are you involved in? Please, whatever it is…
translation.ja: 何かに関わってるなら―

translation.en: don't do it.
Ah. It's just you. I thought it was somebody important.
translation.ja: 何だ 君か 重要人物かと思った

translation.en: If living in your own filth is so important, I can leave.
translation.ja: 汚い家に住むのが重要なら 帰ります

translation.en: Well, you did come all this way.
Is it Tuesday already?
I see you have been writing.
Columns. For my sins.
translation.ja: コラムだ　何の罰だか

translation.en: It's juice. I know what's good for me.
translation.ja: ジュースだ　節制してる

translation.en: After a week- long search led by local police,
translation.ja: １週間にわたる 捜索の末― １週間にわたる 捜索の末― 〝タンディとの対話〞

translation.en: Garth's body was ultimately recovered near a stream in Philippi.
translation.ja: 〝タンディとの対話〞 ガースの遺体はフィリッピの 水路で見つかりました

translation.ja: 今日 お招きした 娘さんと奥さんは

translation.en: who are recounting their harrowing journey in their hopes of finding justice…
translation.ja: 痛ましい経験をしながら 正義への希望を…

translation.en: Very intellectual.
It's no Felicia, but it hits the spot.

translation.en: 1996 called.
And when did you know he wasn't coming home? That he was dead?

translation.en: He hadn't called. He always called.

translation.en: I just looked at my mom, and I knew.

translation.en: If you want to study humanity, you should watch daytime TV talk shows.
translation.ja: 人間を知りたいなら トーク番組を見るといい

translation.en: You suspect there might be more to it.
There has to be more to it.
He had enemies. We knew this.
translation.ja: 〝メラニー･ フィリューン〞 父には敵がいた

translation.en: The daughter did it.
- Our house is very secure. - What?
- Please. Look at her. - It has to have been someone he knew.
translation.ja: 彼女をよく見ろ 犯人は知人よ

translation.en: It was her, the daughter.
Well, I see.
Well, when you have multiple awards for your investigative journalism, and a Sunday Times bestseller,
translation.ja: 調査報道で賞を取り ベストセラー作家になるまで

translation.en: you can be the judge of character around here.
translation.ja: 人を批判するのは早い

translation.en: No offense.
Well, Mr. Ngesi, if I did not clean up after you,
translation.ja: あなたが雇い主でなければ―

translation.en: I would think you were an arrogant ass.
translation.ja: 傲慢(ごうまん)と見なしたわ

translation.en: There's no underestimating you, Zenzi.
Indeed.
Hello.
Zenzi?
- It's not your day today. - I know.
But I can't come in later this week. A- and I really need to speak to Mr. Hendricks.
translation.ja: 週後半は来られないし ヘンドリックス氏に話もある

translation.en: Please, Nancy. I need the work.
translation.ja: お願い　ナンシー 仕事が必要なの

translation.en: Okay.
Thank you.
I pay you to solve my problems. I don't pay you so I can solve my own problems. So fucking solve it.
translation.ja: さっさと問題を解決しろ そのためにカネを払ってる

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, Zenzi, what the fuck are you doing here? What day is it?
translation.ja: 何してる？ 今日は何曜日だ？

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. Hendricks. Nancy said I can work today.
translation.ja: すみません ナンシーが許可を

translation.en: Nancy said.
Okay, but you're not supposed to see this shit. You can keep your mouth shut, right?
translation.ja: 構わないが 何も見なかったことに

translation.en: I know what you do here, sir. I've worked here for a while now.
translation.ja: 分かってます　もう長いので

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I know. Just…  …mind your own business and clean something.
translation.ja: とにかく 自分の仕事に集中しろ

translation.en: Keep it away from Zenzi. Just let her clean. That's all Max asked for. What the fuck am I supposed to do?
translation.ja: マックスに頼まれて雇ったが 俺はどうすれば？

translation.en: You're happy working here, right?
Yes. Yes. Of course, sir.
You've been good to us, sir.
Don't you forget that.
Um, I've been meaning to ask, sir--
I can't give you another advance, Zenzi. I wish this was my money, but it's not.
translation.ja: 前払いは無理だ これは俺のカネじゃない

translation.en: I'm not looking for money. I'm looking for Max.
translation.ja: いえ　夫を捜してるんです

translation.en: - Max is in jail. - No, he got out.
translation.ja: 服役中だ 昨日 出所しました

translation.en: Yesterday.
translation.ja: 昨日 出所しました

translation.en: What are you telling me?
Nobody told me.
Nobody fucking told me. Somebody's getting cut up for this.
translation.ja: 初耳だ　厄介事になるぞ

translation.en: Fuck.
You know Max is welcome here, right? So where the fuck is he?
translation.ja: 俺は味方だ　ヤツはどこに？

translation.en: That's what I'm asking you, sir.
I went to fetch him yesterday, but…
translation.ja: 昨日 迎えに行ったら―

translation.en: he wasn't there. I… I… I can't find him.
translation.ja: 既に出所した後でした

translation.en: Okay, listen…
you and me, we need to find Max.
There's a lot of shit happening out there, okay? A lot of unfinished business.
translation.ja: 今はいろいろヤバい時期だ

translation.en: And would, uh, would Jackson know? Jackson Thom, your partner.
translation.ja: ジャクソン･トムなら？ あなたの相棒ですよね

translation.en: Jackson Thom is no partner of mine, okay? He's a fucking sociopath.
translation.ja: 相棒じゃない ヤツはソシオパスだ

translation.en: I'm warning you, Zenzi. Stay away from him. He's dangerous. And Max owes him money.
translation.ja: ヤツには近づくな マックスが借金してる

translation.en: And if Jackson knows Max is out, that is a bad move for Max.
translation.ja: ジャクソンに 出所が知れたらマズい

translation.en: Fuck.
You and me, we're gonna stay far away from Jackson. You hear me?
translation.ja: ジャクソンには近づくな いいか？

translation.en: - Okay. - What the fuck?
Fuck, Raymond. Those fuckers moved on us. Jackson's guys.
translation.ja: ボス　ジャクソンの手下が 手を出してきた

translation.en: - We took some hits. - Those motherfuckers!
translation.ja: ボス　ジャクソンの手下が 手を出してきた あいつらめ

translation.en: You… You get out of here, okay? Leave it with me. I'll find Max.
translation.ja: 君は帰れ マックスは俺が捜す

translation.en: Move him to the back.
Those motherfuckers. Put him down.
Just put him down.
See you next week.
- Where the fuck is Joseph? - We don't know. He wasn't there.
translation.ja: ジョゼフは？ 分かりません

translation.en: Nancy.
Do you know where I can find Jackson Thom? It's important.
translation.ja: ジャクソン･トムの居場所を 知ってる？

translation.en: - - Bite on this. Bite! Fuck.
translation.ja: これを噛(か)んでろ クソ

translation.en: Nancy, please.
This is a fucking mess.
Do you remember that night when I told Bevan that you were with me?
translation.ja: 前に口裏を 合わせてあげたよね

translation.en: When you were…
Ruthless, Zenzi. Ruthless.
translation.ja: 冷酷な人ね　ゼンジ

translation.en: Hi.
I'm looking for a job.
Yeah, the boss is over there.
Excuse me!
Hello.
I'm looking for the boss.
Well, the boss isn't here.
I can take a message.
Are you Jackson?
Am I supposed to know you? Who sent you?
I'm looking for my husband.
I know you. You work for Raymond.
translation.ja: レイモンドの下で 働いてる女だな

translation.en: What do you do? Clean his toilets?
You're Max's little wife. You don't need to answer. I know that.
translation.ja: マックスの女房だろ 知ってる

translation.en: It's my business to know things.
Honestly… he was better off inside.
translation.ja: ヤツは塀の中にいたほうが よかった

translation.en: 'Cause outside, they can't protect him.
Max, he owes me… a lot.
translation.ja: ヤツは俺に大金を借りてる

translation.en: I've been sitting here, waiting for him to knock on my door.
translation.ja: 俺はヤツが来るのを待ってた

translation.en: Wondering that… if he doesn't show…
translation.ja: だが来ないなら 借金のカタを―

translation.en: am I going to need collateral?
Now I'm wondering…
if collateral didn't just walk into my workshop.
translation.ja: そのカタが自ら現れた

translation.en: - It has nothing to do with me. - Oh, that's where you're wrong.
translation.ja: 私は無関係よ それは違う

translation.en: It's got everything to do with you. Until Max pays me, whatever's Max's is mine.
translation.ja: マックスが借金を返すまで ヤツのものは俺のものだ

translation.en: And I might as well enjoy it.
No! No!
translation.ja: 楽しむのもいい やめて

translation.en: You should put that away.
You might hurt yourself.
Don't come closer. I'll… I'll just leave.
translation.ja: 来ないで　もう帰る

translation.en: Fucking bitch.
Fuck!
What the fuck?
Help.
Help. Help.
Hey. Hey.
No, no, no, no, no, no. No.
translation.ja: そんな　ウソよ 死んじゃダメ

translation.en: No, no.
Wait.
Jackson, please, no.
Jackson! Jackson!
translation.ja: ジャクソン　目を開けて

translation.en: Jackson.
- Hello? - It was the daughter.
translation.ja: はい 犯人は娘だった

translation.en: You were right. The daughter killed her father.
I don't know how you knew it, but you hit the nail right on the head.
translation.ja: なんで分かったんだ？ 名推理だ

translation.en: Hello?
Are you there?
Yes, sir. I'm here.
Well, actually, I wanted to speak to you about a new idea for a book.
translation.ja: 新しい本の件で― 電話ではなく 直接 君と話したい

translation.en: Maybe better when you get here.
translation.ja: 電話ではなく 直接 君と話したい

translation.en: I think you're actually gonna like this one.
Hello?
Zenzile, is everything okay?
I'm fine.
I'll call you later, okay?
Just drop by when you get the--
What do we really know about the invisible women in our lives?
translation.ja: 見えざる女性たちについて 何を知ってる？

translation.en: They wash our clothes,
sweep our floors, know us better than we know ourselves,
translation.ja: 掃除をし 我々のことを熟知してる

translation.en: sometimes more than we'd like to admit.
translation.ja: 時には認めたくないほどにね

translation.en: How often do we reach out into their lives the way they seamlessly move in and out of ours?
translation.ja: 我々は彼女たちの生活に どの程度 出入りしてる？

translation.en: Do we dare to look outside of our self- involved lives?
translation.ja: 外の世界をのぞく勇気が 我々にあるだろうか

translation.en: But one momentary interaction can remind even an aging narcissist
translation.ja: だが一瞬の会話が 他者の人生の存在を 思い出させてくれる

translation.en: that there's life outside of our own.
translation.ja: 他者の人生の存在を 思い出させてくれる

translation.en: A rich tapestry of stories, tragedy, resilience.
translation.ja: それは物語や悲劇 耐久力の つづれ織りだ

translation.en: I want to write a new story.
translation.ja: 新しい物語を書きたい 新しい物語を書きたい 〝目立たぬ存在〞

translation.en: The story of a woman, softly- spoken, unremarkable
translation.ja: 物腰が柔らかくて 目立たないが

translation.en: but with a dignity of strength I haven't often seen,
translation.ja: 力強い尊厳を持つ 女性の物語だ

translation.en: who's taken knock after knock but finds the strength to get back up,
translation.ja: 何度 困難に見舞われても 立ち上がる強さがある

translation.en: a woman I'd like to call a friend.
To a younger man, maybe even more.
translation.ja: 若ければ恋心を抱いたかも

translation.en: Who's seen the worst of heartbreak, but who has resolved to live,
translation.ja: 失意の底に沈んでも 生きると決意し

translation.en: to live with the best of hearts and make the right decisions, always.
translation.ja: 常に最高の心で 正しい決断を下す女性だ

translation.en: What will happen to this woman when the world around her is in chaos…
translation.ja: 周りの世界が混乱に陥れば 彼女はどうなる？

translation.en: Quick! Get those boxes out of here.
…when her limits are tested, her principles,
translation.ja: 限界や信念が試されたら？

translation.en: when her back is against the wall?
- Then we'll see who she really is. - You, hurry up!
Zenzi, this is not a good time.
Nancy, move it. This is the first place they're gonna come to.
translation.ja: ナンシー　グズグズするな

translation.en: They're coming right fucking now. Twenty minutes max. Wipe the drives.
translation.ja: 連中は 20分もしないうちに来る

translation.en: Joseph, you take the car and get out of here.
translation.ja: ジョゼフ　車で逃げろ

translation.en: If they're gonna search this place, the only thing they're gonna find is the finest cuts of tomahawk steaks, you get me?
translation.ja: ここを捜索しても 出てくるのは高級肉だけだ

translation.en: You. You shouldn't be here right now.
translation.ja: ゼンジ　今すぐ帰るんだ

translation.en: Okay, motherfuckers, move it! It's day zero!
translation.ja: 全員 急げ 踏ん張りどころだぞ

translation.en: Okay.
Holy mother of fuck.
Jackson Thom is dead.
The guy you came to ask about just a few hours ago, he's dead.
translation.ja: 数時間前に君が尋ねた男だ

translation.en: But somehow I get the feeling you already know that, don't you?
translation.ja: だが もう知ってたろ？

translation.en: The whole fucking city's gonna think that I did it and with my own gun.
translation.ja: 街中が俺の仕業だと疑う

translation.en: Ray.
translation.ja: レイモンド　警察が来た

translation.en: - They're here. - You stay here.
translation.ja: レイモンド　警察が来た ここにいろ 何も話すんじゃないぞ

translation.en: And don't you say a fucking word, you got me?
translation.ja: ここにいろ 何も話すんじゃないぞ

translation.en: And hide that thing.
Uys and Van der Merwe, I want you in there. Thorough checks, okay?
translation.ja: あなたたち２人は そこを捜索して

translation.en: Twala, Bennett, that side. Even the freezers.
translation.ja: トワラとベネットは奥を 冷凍庫もよ

translation.en: You, I want you in there.
Check hard drives, files, boxes, computers…
translation.ja: ハードドライブにファイル パソコン…

translation.en: Come on. The rest follow me.
translation.ja: 残りは私と一緒に来て

translation.en: I want you on that side. Bring me anything significant.
translation.ja: 重要なものがあれば知らせて

translation.en: Let's go.
You sure no one followed you?
Got out just in time, I guess. Drove around a couple hours.
translation.ja: 間一髪で逃げて 数時間 運転してました

translation.en: - What's going on, boss? - I wish I fucking knew.
translation.ja: 何事です？ 俺が知りたい 元凶はマックスだ

translation.en: - Somehow Max is right in the middle of it. - Max?
translation.ja: 俺が知りたい 元凶はマックスだ 何？

translation.en: Max and his bitch wife.
She took my gun and some cash, and now Jackson is dead.
translation.ja: 彼女が銃とカネを奪い ジャクソンが死んだ

translation.en: Everyone is gonna think it was us.
And Blessing?
The devil himself.
Right on cue.
translation.ja: やっぱりな やっぱりな 〝ブレッシング〞

translation.en: You've really fucked things up now, huh?
What part of keep the peace don't you motherfuckers understand?
translation.ja: “平和を維持しろ”の意味が 分からないか？

translation.en: I'm looking into it.
Yes, you are. Come and see me.
translation.ja: 当然だ　会いに来い

translation.en: If you go, you might not come back.
translation.ja: 会いに行けば 生きて戻れないかも

translation.en: I know. But I'm working on something.
translation.ja: ああ　だが考えがある

translation.en: Hello?
Max?  Is it you?
I really need you.
Hello?
Max.
Hey! Get in!
Friend…
What happened?
There.
Zenzile Mwale?
Let's have a chat.
You were at Raymond Hendricks's business earlier today.
translation.ja: 今日 ヘンドリックスの 会社にいたわね

translation.en: I…
You clean for Raymond Hendricks?
translation.ja: 彼の会社で清掃の仕事を？

translation.en: - I do. - And?
And I went there today…
even though it wasn't my day to work. I just…
translation.ja: 勤務日ではなかったのですが 私はただ…

translation.en: I was going because I was trying to find my husband.
translation.ja: 夫の居場所を知りたくて

translation.en: Mr. Hendricks couldn't help me either.
And so…
He left it open.
I don't know why I took it.
I wasn't even thinking. I was just trying to find Max.
translation.ja: 私はただ 夫を捜そうとしてただけです

translation.en: We have reason to believe Raymond's involved in organized criminal activity.
translation.ja: レイモンドは 組織的犯罪に関与してる

translation.en: Did you see any drugs at the butchery or weapons?
translation.ja: 会社で麻薬や武器を 見たことは？

translation.en: I'm just a cleaner.
Does the name Jackson Thom mean anything to you?
translation.ja: ジャクソン･トムを 知ってる？

translation.en: He was found dead today, and we think it was a gangland hit.
translation.ja: 今日 遺体で発見された ギャングの仕業よ

translation.en: We think your husband could be involved.
translation.ja: あなたのご主人が 関わってるかも

translation.en: We understand there's history there.
When's the last time you saw him?
A week ago.
Do you perhaps have a recent photograph of him?
Do you know where I can find Jackson Thom? It's important.
translation.ja: ジャクソン･トムの居場所を 知ってる？

translation.en: That's our guy.
Hold on.
If you hear from your husband, if you see him, if you can think of anything,
translation.ja: ご主人から連絡があったり 何か思い出したりしたら

translation.en: I want to know.
And woman to woman, I can help you out of a scene you don't want to be any part of.
translation.ja: 同じ女として 私ならあなたの力になれる

translation.en: Are you gonna tell me what happened?
Maybe another time.
Tonight…
We cannot have that type of disruption happening here.
translation.ja: あんなことがあっては困る

translation.en: If you are involved in something, we cannot have it.
translation.ja: 何かに関わってるなら クビだぞ

translation.en: I know.
I'm sorry, sir. I…
And I'm not involved in anything.
It's your first warning.
Asshole.
Friend…
you've gotta stand up for yourself.
What do you want?
Just to talk.
Then talk.
I have a job offer. From Raymond.
translation.ja: レイモンドが 仕事を頼みたいそうだ

translation.en: Another target.
I am not a killer for hire.
So far so good, I say.
Get in, get out… unsuspected.
translation.ja: 疑われることなく出入りした

translation.en: You're invisible.
No.
Do it, and you get paid for your trouble. But don't…
translation.ja: やれば報酬がもらえるが 断れば…

translation.en: …and the police might learn who really pulled the trigger on Jackson Thom.
translation.ja: ジャクソン殺しの真犯人を タレ込む

translation.en: They won't believe you.
They will believe it's Max.
My husband is not a murderer.
He should've taken the money and done the time like he was told. But Max…
translation.ja: カネを受け取り 服役すべきだったのに

translation.en: Max had to fuck around with the wrong people.
translation.ja: ヤツは余計なことをした

translation.en: Who did Max take the fall for?
Why?
All you need to know is
if Max hadn't stepped out of line, your son would still be alive.
translation.ja: ヤツが従ってれば 息子は生きてた

translation.en: The boy didn't have to die. It's all Max's fault.
translation.ja: 息子が死んだのは マックスのせいだ

translation.en: The next train does not stop here.
translation.ja: この電車は当駅を通過します

translation.en: Just a friendly reminder.
What happened to Esulu could easily happen--
Don't you say his name.
translation.ja: あの子の名前を口にしないで

translation.en: Max.
Did he even shed a tear when he found out his soft little son was dead?
translation.ja: ナヨナヨした息子が死んだ時 涙を流した？
